This is much better then HL1 in my opinion. The controls are very good, they feel more like a modern shooter then HL1 did. Storywise, it feels a lot more fleshed out, with tons of little nooks and crannies fleshing out the true extent of the Combine's rule. If you haven't played it yet, you really should.
Good game with good story and several plot twists. 10/10

One of the best games ever created!

The best game of the decade. You may think think that this game is serious. 
The jokes: Of course it is mostly serious but with little humour sprinkled it is just so good.
Difficulty : Although there is difficulty settings whichever you chose willl be Hard, annoying, unforgiving and fun to Just Fun.
Gameplay: A good Fps with physics puzzles sprinkled around. There is also chapters where the playing ways may change (Riding a car,not using weapons etc.). You may think that's bad but they don't mostly change the way much or if it does it is fun or optional.
Price : The price is  very plausible and if you want to have all of Half life 2 (2,Chapter 1 and chapter 2) I recommend buying the orange box.
Bugs/glitches: There is very I encountered a few (Crows flying but not moving,going Getting pushed to the sky in a cutscene by being so fast) not counting the visual bugs that you will not encounter very much.They are not immersion breaking (screen flickering etc.) and if there are  there is a mostly easy solutions. (There might be game breaking bugs but I have not seen one)

Пройдя вторую часть Half-Life, могу сказать, что в этой игре крайне интересный и грамотно продуманный сюжет. Даже несмотря на то, что сейчас 2021 год, играть было приятно из-за потрясающего сюжета. К тому же, даже с учетом того, что игра вышла в 2004 году, графика в игре выглядит достаточно неплохо. Очень хорошо проработана физика объектов и воды. Даже в 2021 году я настоятельно рекомендую пройти эту классическую игру, если же вы графодр0чер, то можете установить парочку модов для улучшения картинки.
Simply buy it, worth every penny!

Моя любимая цитата Гордона Фримена:

The game everyone wants a sequel from, Half-Life, from its beta to the full release now, cut content, cut enemies still in the game.  It still holds up well with a great story making me feel almost terrified at the thought that humans as a society now probably wouldn't survive an attack from an Alien force, and with the release of Alyx, the game feels nice to revisit.

I first played the series on early generation consoles and later the Orange Box on the Xbox 360™ [ which introduced me to Portal and TF2 ] and the games give me a nostalgic burst of happiness, It still amazes me how the models of humans in the game hold up to this day, especially Gman’s model!

Nonetheless, it is a definite 10 / 10, compared to the original it is less value on what is going on, while the story is not the main focus it does a good job and the soundtrack is gorgeous, although reusing some songs from the first game it still makes me feel ready to kick some transhuman ass :)
